org.teamfarce.mirch

Class InputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.teamfarce.mirch.InputController

  • public class InputController
extends java.lang.Object
    The input controller deals with all mouse and keyboard inputs, converting them to meaningful commands for use by the render function.
    Author:
    jacobwunwin
